resp = client.security.put_role_mapping(
    name="jwt_user1",
    refresh=True,
    roles=[
        "jwt_role1"
    ],
    rules={
        "all": [
            {
                "field": {
                    "realm.name": "jwt2"
                }
            },
            {
                "field": {
                    "username": "user2"
                }
            }
        ]
    },
    enabled=True,
    metadata={
        "version": 1
    },
)
print(resp)
